tool_description:
This is the Learning API for the Integrated Virtual Learning Environment (IVLE) used by the National University of Singapore.

With this API, you will be able to access your course information on any platform that has internet access.

Usage of this API is governed by the NUS Acceptable Use Policy found at https://inetapps.nus.edu.sg/AUP/aup.htm
name: IVLE LAPI
title: IVLE LAPI

api_list.name: NUScastEvents_Year
api_list.description: Gets the academic years and semesters to display for NUScast Events
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nuscit-ivle-lapi2.p.rapidapi.com/NUScastEvents_Year"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nuscit-ivle-lapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nuscit-ivle-lapi2.p.rapidapi.com/NUScastEvents_Year"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Login
NUScastPublicEvents_Files
api_list.description: Gets the related list of events for the Department or Year.

required_parameters.name: TitleOnly
required_parameters.description: Whether to display the title without the details. [true] to display basic module information. [false] to display detailed module information.

required_parameters.name: MP4Only
required_parameters.description: Whether to display events without MP4 format. [true] to display events with MP4 format only. [false] to display all events.

api_list.name: Bulletin_Modules
api_list.description: Gets the related list of bulletin modules for the faculty and academic semester.

required_parameters.name: Faculty
required_parameters.description: The Faculty Code. Eg. 31 - ARTS & SOCIAL SCIENCES; 32 - SCIENCE; 34 - DENTISTRY; 35 - LAW.

required_parameters.name: Semester
required_parameters.description: AcadSemester obtained from the [Bulletin_AcademicYearSemester] function. In the format 1, 2, 3 or 4.

required_parameters.name: TitleOnly
required_parameters.description: Whether to display the title without the details. [true] to display basic module information. [false] to display detailed module information.
